full_summary:
# Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Cloud Migration Services

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4055255823-Doc4058402598
* **Publication Date**: June 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 11, 2023, 14:00 EDT
* **Amendment Number**: 9
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 18, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: August 30, 2025

## Solicitation Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking Informatics Professional Services to support the migration of application assets and workloads to the cloud. The requirements are to be fulfilled under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) method.

Only TBIPS SA Holders who hold a TBIPS SA for Tier 2, in all required resource categories, and in the National Capital Region under the EN578-170432 series of SAs are eligible to compete.

## Selection Criteria

The selection criteria are based on a Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

## Regions of Opportunity

This tender opportunity is open to all interested suppliers.

## Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information

If you have any questions or require additional information, please contact Sylvie Morin (SPAC/PSPC) at [sylvie.morin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sylvie.morin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

## Tender Documents

The tender documents are available on the Ariba Discovery website at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16608152?extsite=MTY2MDgxNTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Trade Agreements

This tender is governed by the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World
